entry.title: Image improvements
entry.content:
This release adds two major improvements to image editables and path front matter inputs.

Features:

  • Configurable asset upload paths
  • Image editables now use srcset when uploaded image is large enough

Fixes:

  • Mixed content warnings with http:// images
  • Code block indentation
  • Resize options showing undefined
  • URL view overlapping comments
  • Allow hyphens for SAML issuer suffix
  • Markdown code sections don’t escape underscores, asterisks and slashes
entry.summary: This release adds two major improvements to image editables and path front matter inputs.

entry.title: Scheduled Builds
entry.content:
This release introduces scheduling for future posts and arbitrary site builds. Timezone support has been overhauled to ensure clarity when setting up automated or manual future builds.

Features:

  • Scheduled and repeating builds
  • Support for timezones
  • Editable Regions now output formatted HTML

Fixes:

  • Toggle details for metrics views fixed
  • YAML long text no longer default entry for new array entries
  • New categories can be added again in front matter multi select field
  • “Post” no longer erroneously appearing in front matter select option
  • Bitbucket Connect interface fixed
entry.summary: This release introduces scheduling for future posts and arbitrary site builds. Timezone support has been overhauled to ensure clarity when setting up automated or manual future builds.

entry.title: Custom Editor Styles
entry.content:
This release extends the editor configuration to allow custom styles, alignment and structure.

Features:

  • Customisable styles dropdown for Content Editor, Editable Regions and Rich Text fields
  • Alignment toolbar options
  • Format toolbar options
  • Base domain and HTTP to HTTPS redirects are now 301 instead of 302
  • Better performance for date and date time fields
  • Increased the allowed character set for folders

Fixes:

  • Image resizing for files with mixed or upper case extensions no longer bypassed
  • Inline images in the Content Editor are no longer styled as if they were block level
  • Import image from a URL functionality restored
entry.summary: This release extends the editor configuration to allow custom styles, alignment and structure.

entry.title: General fixes
entry.content:
This release contains general fixes and consistency changes.

Fixes:

  • Create organisation button is disabled after submit
  • Collection breadcrumb is consistent with navigation
  • Permissions of files maintained in syncing
  • HTTPS upgrade is a 301 instead of 302
  • FTP output reliability and performance
  • External org users issues
  • Reduced trial emails
entry.summary: This release contains general fixes and consistency changes.

entry.title: New and Improved Front Matter Interfaces

link.title: New and Improved Front Matter Interfaces

entry.content:
This release focuses on the front matter editing experience and general fixes.

Features:

  • Code front matter interface
  • URL front matter interface
  • Long text field front matter interface
  • data-src is rewritten when optimised
  • Git repositories are split by the owner when adding a provider

Fixes:

  • Improved sync speeds
  • Large CSVs are loaded faster
  • Rotation on jpeg images is applied on upload
  • Switch editor state and context menu text is no longer set to brand color
  • Credit card failure messages on change plan more obvious
  • Clicking remove in the CSV editor removes the last row
  • Layout select doesn’t blank field if set to missing layout
  • Credit card form shows error messages
  • New lines in markdown table content
  • Underscores escaped in markdown output
  • Space after first three dashes stopped front matter editor loading
  • Front matter _number no longer blanks non-number fields
entry.summary: This release focuses on the front matter editing experience and general fixes.

entry.title: Sierra Safari Fix
entry.content:
This release fixes the editor in all older versions of MacOS.

Fixes:

  • MacOS before High Sierra Safari editor size
  • Empty brand add button working in all browsers
  • Scroll into view on file create works in new design
  • Collection configure has correct spacing and doesn’t error
entry.summary: This release fixes the editor in all older versions of MacOS.

entry.title: Outputs & Custom Editor Toolbars
entry.content:
This release adds two major features, the option to output a generated site and editor toolbar customisation. See our feature post in our blog.

Features:

  • Rework of Site Settings / Storage Providers to Site Settings / File Syncing
  • Added Site Settings / Storage Providers / Output
  • Customise editor toolbars
  • New controls options (e.g. table, subscript, superscript)

Fixes:

  • Hex validation on brand color
  • Build icon spins the right way in Status and alignment fixed
  • Add items to a certain cases of front matter arrays
  • Download invoice fixed
  • CSV editor now works with no entries
  • Extensionless URLs redirects to / instead of /index.html for index pages
  • Name spaced editor injected CSS
  • Force HTTPS now works on password pages
entry.summary: This release adds two major features, the option to output a generated site and editor toolbar customisation. See our feature post in our blog.

entry.title: Publish Requests
entry.content:
This release provides support for merging with pull requests instead of a direct merge.

Features:

  • Publish Request workflow
  • Updated Dropbox logos

Fixes:

  • Forking a template now saves a better repository full name rather than relying on a redirect
entry.summary: This release provides support for merging with pull requests instead of a direct merge.
